PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MobileTelecommunicationsApplianceTypeBasebandUnit
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsAppliance and types of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsApplianceType with the predefined type set to BASEBANDUNIT.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCarriers
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates how many carrier frequencies can be managed by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfEmergencyTransceivers
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of emergency transceivers in the base band unit.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumNumberOfRRUs
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum number of remote radio units (RRU) which can be connected to the baseband unit.
